name: Pollen Nation (Guillaume PNP)
description:
Type of game: A card game for 2 players only that lasts less than 5 minutes.

Graphics (game-icon.net): Delapouite and Lorc.

General presentation
- It is a worker placement and a set collection game.
- Players are bees which try to collect a maximum of pollen for their queen.
- The bee worker which collect the most pollen will win the game.
